__e: When I smell it, she's there and I know that she's real and that, somehow, she's still alive for us.
You know, I've seen one of those in real life and let me tell you something-- not so funny.
It'll take a couple of days to confirm whether the threat is real or imaginary.
Yes... yes, she's real, or yes she's in your dream?
I don't give a shit whether it's real or not.
Since you're not real, there's no point in continuing this conversation.
She is more real to you than we are.
Hey, you were always real to me buddy, even when you weren't.
She was the most real person in Deadwood.
